summary: Replaces standard Iron Arrows with Large Pink Phalluses
descriptionHtml:
Why would I do such a thing? Because why the hell not, that\'s why.

And it seemed the logical first step in learning how to import models into Skyrim.

Using the Nexus Mod Manager is recommended simply because it\'s badass, however if you don\'t want to you can just delete ironarrow.nif and ironarrowflight.nif from the data/meshes/weapons/iron folder and delete quiver.dds and quiver_n.dds from the data/textures/weapons/iron folder.  Still use the Nexus Mod Manager if you can.

Nexus Mod Manager - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/content/modmanager/
author: HONkUS
